refnamediv.refpurpose: Positions the eye point to the given x, y, and z coordinates.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Positions the eye point to the given x, y, and z coordinates (specified in mm).

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the eye_pt command to situate the eye point at a specified coordinate position.

example.title: Situate the eye point at a specified coordinate position.

listitem.para: The eye point is located at 100 mm along the x axis.
